claude emporium

A plugin marketplace for claude code
install Â· plugins Â· synergy Â· architecture Â· contributing

roma victrix

--- three plugins that wrap standalone MCP servers with automation hooks, commands, and skills. no code duplication â€” plugins tell claude _when_ to act, MCPs handle _how_. ``` marketplace /plugin marketplace add Vvkmnn/claude-emporium # install plugins â€” each registers its MCP server automatically /plugin install claude-praetorian@claude-emporium /plugin install claude-historian@claude-emporium /plugin install claude-oracle@claude-emporium # or install standalone MCP servers only (no hooks, commands, or skills) # claude mcp add praetorian -- bunx claude-praetorian-mcp # https://github.com/Vvkmnn/claude-praetorian-mcp # claude mcp add historian -- bunx claude-historian-mcp # https://github.com/Vvkmnn/claude-historian-mcp # claude mcp add oracle -- bunx claude-oracle-mcp # https://github.com/Vvkmnn/claude-oracle-mcp ``` ## plugins

praetorian

context guard. saves and restores valuable context before compaction, after research, and when subagents complete. | hook | trigger | action | |------|---------|--------| | `PreToolUse` | `EnterPlanMode` | lists prior compactions before planning | | `PreCompact` | `*` | saves context before compaction resets it | | `PostToolUse` | `WebFetch` Â· `WebSearch` | prompts to compact research findings | | `SubagentStop` | `*` | prompts to compact subagent results | commands: `/praetorian-compact` Â· `/praetorian-restore` Â· `/praetorian-search` mcp: [`claude-praetorian-mcp`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-praetorian-mcp) â€” storage at `.claude/praetorian/`
---

historian

session memory. checks past sessions before you do redundant research, planning, or debugging. | hook | trigger | action | |------|---------|--------| | `PreToolUse` | `WebSearch` Â· `WebFetch` | checks history before web research | | `PreToolUse` | `EnterPlanMode` | searches past plans before planning | | `PreToolUse` | `Task` | checks tool patterns before launching agents | | `PostToolUse` | `Bash` | suggests error solutions after failures | commands: `/historian-search` mcp: [`claude-historian-mcp`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-historian-mcp) â€” 7 search tools across conversations, errors, files, plans
---

oracle

tool discovery. searches 17 sources in parallel to find relevant skills, plugins, and MCP servers. | hook | trigger | action | |------|---------|--------| | `PreToolUse` | `EnterPlanMode` | searches for relevant tools before planning | | `PostToolUse` | `Bash` | searches for tools that solve errors | commands: `/oracle-search` Â· `/oracle-browse` mcp: [`claude-oracle-mcp`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-oracle-mcp) â€” smithery, glama, npm, github, awesome-mcp-servers, and more
## architecture each plugin is a thin wrapper. hooks inject prompts that trigger MCP tools at high-impact moments. plugins contain no business logic â€” they tell claude _when_ to search, save, or restore. the MCP servers handle the actual work. ``` hook fires â†’ plugin injects prompt â†’ claude calls mcp â†’ result flows back ``` zero setup beyond installation. no databases, no local storage (except praetorian's project-local `.claude/praetorian/`). all search is computed in-memory with TTL caching. ## synergy each plugin works standalone. when multiple are installed, they detect siblings at runtime and coordinate â€” no configuration needed. ``` oracle â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ discoveries when saving â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ historian notes praetorian â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ will compact research after â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â–º ğŸ”® â—„â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚ â”‚ oracle â”‚ â”‚ tool discovery â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ oracle notes historian checking oracle notes â”‚ â”‚ past solutions on errors praetorian has â”‚ â”‚ saved compactions â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ ``` **enhanced behaviors when siblings are detected:** | event | plugin | alone | with siblings | |-------|--------|-------|---------------| | plan | âšœï¸ praetorian | lists prior compactions | + historian searches past plans, oracle discovers tools | | plan | ğŸ“œ historian | searches past plans and decisions | + oracle will also search for relevant tools | | plan | ğŸ”® oracle | searches 17 registries for tools | + historian has past plans, praetorian has compactions | | compact | âšœï¸ praetorian | snapshots context to `.claude/praetorian/` | + includes oracle tool discoveries in the snapshot | | error | ğŸ“œ historian | searches past sessions for solutions | + oracle also searching for tools that solve this class of error | | error | ğŸ”® oracle | searches registries for error-solving tools | + historian checking how this error was solved before | | web search | ğŸ“œ historian | checks history before redundant research | + praetorian will compact the research findings after | | subagent stop | âšœï¸ praetorian | prompts to compact subagent results | standalone â€” no sibling interaction | | task launch | ğŸ“œ historian | checks tool patterns before agents | standalone â€” no sibling interaction | detection is one `fs.readFileSync` call (~1ms). falls back gracefully if settings are missing. ## contributing bug fixes, improvements, and documentation PRs are welcome. new plugins and MCPs are authored by [@vvkmnn](https://github.com/Vvkmnn) â€” proposals are unlikely to be accepted unless they match the existing vision or inspire something new. **good PRs:** - better hook triggers and matchers - bug fixes and edge case handling - documentation and examples - performance improvements ## troubleshooting **plugin not triggering?** verify the mcp server is running: `claude mcp list` **mcp not found?** install via npm: `claude mcp add -- npx ` **hook errors?** check that node.js is available and `CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT` is set. ## license MIT
files.plugins/claude-praetorian/README.md:
# Claude Praetorian

Automatic context preservation for Claude Code. Prompts you to save and restore valuable context at the right moments â€” before planning, after research, when subagents complete.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add Vvkmnn/claude-emporium
/plugin install claude-praetorian@claude-emporium
```

## Requirements

MCP server: [`claude-praetorian-mcp`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-praetorian-mcp)

```bash
claude mcp add praetorian -- npx claude-praetorian-mcp
```

## Hooks

| Event | Trigger | What It Does |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| `PreToolUse` | `EnterPlanMode` | Lists prior compactions before you start planning |
| `PreCompact` | `*` | Saves context before compaction resets it |
| `PostToolUse` | `WebFetch` Â· `WebSearch` | Prompts to compact research findings |
| `SubagentStop` | `*` | Prompts to compact subagent results |

## Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/praetorian-compact [type] [title]` | Save current context (interactive or with args) |
| `/praetorian-restore [query]` | Load previous context (recent or searched) |
| `/praetorian-search <query>` | Search past compactions |

**Compaction types:** `web_research` Â· `task_result` Â· `file_reads` Â· `decisions`

## How It Works

Hooks inject prompts that trigger `claude-praetorian-mcp` tools at high-impact moments. No business logic in the plugin â€” it tells Claude *when* to compact, the MCP handles *how*.

Storage is project-local at `.claude/praetorian/`.

## License

MIT
files.plugins/claude-historian/README.md:
# Claude Historian

Automatic history search for Claude Code. Checks past sessions before you do redundant web research, planning, or debugging.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add Vvkmnn/claude-emporium
/plugin install claude-historian@claude-emporium
```

## Requirements

MCP server: [`claude-historian-mcp`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-historian-mcp)

```bash
claude mcp add historian -- npx claude-historian-mcp
```

## Hooks

| Event | Trigger | What It Does |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| `PreToolUse` | `WebSearch` Â· `WebFetch` | Checks history before web research |
| `PreToolUse` | `EnterPlanMode` | Searches past plans before planning |
| `PreToolUse` | `Task` | Checks tool patterns before launching agents |
| `PostToolUse` | `Bash` | Suggests error solutions after command failures |

## Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/historian-search <query>` | Search past sessions for solutions, decisions, context |

## MCP Tools

| Tool | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `search_conversations` | General history search |
| `find_similar_queries` | Find related past questions |
| `get_error_solutions` | Find how errors were fixed |
| `find_file_context` | Track file changes |
| `find_tool_patterns` | Discover successful workflows |
| `list_recent_sessions` | Browse recent work |
| `search_plans` | Find past implementation plans |

## How It Works

Hooks inject prompts that trigger `claude-historian-mcp` tools at high-impact moments. If relevant history exists, Claude reuses it. If not, it proceeds silently.

Typical savings: 200-800 tokens per avoided redundant search.

## License

MIT
files.plugins/claude-oracle/README.md:
# Claude Oracle

Automatic discovery of skills, plugins, and MCP servers for Claude Code. Searches 17 sources in parallel to find relevant tools before you start planning or when you hit errors.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add Vvkmnn/claude-emporium
/plugin install claude-oracle@claude-emporium
```

## Requirements

MCP server: [`claude-oracle-mcp`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/claude-oracle-mcp)

```bash
claude mcp add oracle -- npx claude-oracle-mcp
```

## Hooks

| Event | Trigger | What It Does |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| `PreToolUse` | `EnterPlanMode` | Searches for relevant tools before planning |
| `PostToolUse` | `Bash` | Searches for tools that solve errors |

## Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/oracle-search <query> [type]` | Search for tools across all sources |
| `/oracle-browse [category] [type]` | Browse tools by category or popularity |

## MCP Tools

| Tool | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `search` | Search all sources for relevant tools |
| `browse` | Browse by category or popularity |
| `sources` | Show available data sources and status |

## Data Sources (17)

Smithery Registry, Glama.ai, Official MCP Registry, npm Registry, GitHub marketplace plugins, awesome-mcp-servers (wong2), awesome-mcp-lists (collabnix), awesome-claude-code (ccplugins), awesome-claude-code (jmanhype), awesome-agent-skills, Playbooks.com, SkillsMP, and more.

## How It Works

Hooks inject prompts that trigger `claude-oracle-mcp` search at high-impact moments. Results include install commands so you can immediately add useful tools.

Zero setup â€” no databases, no local storage. All search is computed in-memory with TTL caching.

## License

MIT

plugins.name: claude-praetorian
plugins.description: Automatic context preservation hooks for praetorian MCP (saves 50-60% tokens)

plugins.name: claude-historian
plugins.description: Automatic history search hooks for historian MCP (checks past work before research)

plugins.name: claude-oracle
plugins.description: Automatic discovery of skills, plugins, and MCP servers across 17 sources
